#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <numeric>
using namespace std;
#define p(x) cout<<#x<<":"<<x<<"\n"
#define lim 21

int n,m,i,s;
int C[lim],T[lim],A[lim],R[lim],H[lim];

int main()
{
  int z;
  while(scanf("%d%d",&n,&m),n|m)
  {
    n=-n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	  scanf("%d%d",&C[i],&T[i]);
	memset(A,0,sizeof A);
	memset(R,0,sizeof R);
	memset(H,0,sizeof H);
	A[0]=m;
	s=0;
	while(A[n]!=m)
	{
	  for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
	  {
	    if(R[i])
	      R[i]--;
		else if(A[i])
		{
		  H[i]=min(C[i],A[i]);
		  A[i]-=H[i];
		  R[i]=T[i]-1;
		}
	    if(!R[i] && H[i])
		{
		  A[i+1]+=H[i];
		  H[i]=0;
		}
	  }
	  s++;
	}
	printf("%d\n",s);
	if(++z==1)
	  break;
  }
  return 0;
}
